name: admin-panel.toml

platform.name: Admin Panel
platform.description: Administrative dashboard for system management, user administration, and content moderation

rawContent:
# Admin Panel Platform
# Administrative dashboard for managing the system

[platform]
id = "admin-panel"
name = "Admin Panel"
type = "web"
description = "Administrative dashboard for system management, user administration, and content moderation"

[platform.config]
baseRoute = "/admin"
theme = "dark"

[relations]
routes = ["admin-dashboard", "admin-users", "admin-settings"]
roles = ["admin"]
guards = ["admin"]
